name: Stuck in the Sea
description: After some speculations around the main theme "Joined Together", our team have came up with an idea to make a game with two ships tied together in a dangerous sea. Thus, the ships must cooperate in order to avoid being blown up by mines and torpedos. You can play either alone, taking control of both ships, or try to survive with a friend. The Green ship is controlled with the usual WSAD key set, while the Orange ship uses the arrow keys. It is important to note that both ships can't move backwards and both "S" and "Arrow Down" keys are useless. The game is infinite, so if one of the ships is fatally damaged, the game restarts.
